title: Sidewall With Frieze And Dado, 1950–58
description: a) Two joined fragments with vertical blue and gray foliate motif bordered on each side by vertical motif of stylized leaves in white. Between vertical elements are yellow and blue patterns of diagonal lines; pale green ground; b) Frieze and dado printed in alternating horizontal rows. Frieze consists of capital for the vertical element of the paper and continuation of diagonal line pattern with stylized leaves above and foliated scalloped border. Dado consists of base for vertical element of paper, alternating with baskets of flowers. One margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall With Frieze And Dado, 1950–58.
1950–58. Machine-printed. Gift of Jessup, Inc.. 1958-115-36-a,b.
